clues.text: This state finds the orange blossom special, so it was made the state flower

Novel in which Tolstoy wrote, "The strongest of all warriors are these two, time & patience"

rounds.text: FDR was named this 3 times, Ike, Truman & Churchill twice; but for 1966 it was the 25 & under generation
